719790f-a.title: Manhattan: Fort George Avenue - Marble Hill Avenue
719790f-a.text:
(1)
Western terminus of Fort George Avenue at Audubon Avenue.
Since this is a horse shoe-shaped avenue which connects
the northern extremities of Audubon and Amsterdam Avenues,
and which intersects no cross-streets throughout its
entire length it has been found advisable to classify
these pictures chronologically rather than geographically.
october 26, 1927.
P.L. Sperr,Photographer.
